scripts.copy: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/vk-google-font-for-block-theme && find . -maxdepth 1 -type f ! \( -name '*.txt' -o -name '*.php' \) -exec rm {} \; && rsync -av --progress --exclude dist/ ./ dist/vk-google-font-for-block-theme/
scripts.zip: npm run dist && cd dist/vk-google-font-for-block-theme && rm -rf .git && rm -rf dist && cd ../ && zip -r vk-google-font-for-block-theme.zip vk-google-font-for-block-theme && cd ..
